newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Esso Singapore crude unit down for three-weeks.
newsitem.headline: Esso Singapore crude unit down for three-weeks.

text.p: Esso Singapore's 110,000-barrel-per-day (BPD) crude distillation unit will be shutdown until the end October for scheduled maintenance, an Esso spokeswoman said on Thursday.
The spokeswoman said the shutdown started late last week.
Esso Singapore Pte Ltd, an affiliate of U.S.Exxon Corp, has been operating a 15-percent cut in crude runs since July at its 230,000-bpd refinery in Pulau Ayer Chawan, an island south of Singapore.
The 15-percent cut was made in the face of meagre refinery margins. --Singapore Newsroom (+65-870-3093)
